name: Cook Panic AR
description:
Welcome to world's most busy cooking game 'Cook Panic'.
You need to fulfill oncoming customer's orders.
However, mischievous cats will not let you take ingredients easy.
Complete dish by collecting ingredients thrown in the air.

◇◆◇◆o*ﾟﾟ*o*ﾟﾟ*o◇◆o*ﾟﾟ*o*ﾟﾟ*o◇◆◇◆

◎ Cooking Game ‘Cook Panic’ - How to play
: Drag to collect ingredients in the air.
: if you complete dish, you get scores!!
: You can earn tips if dish is served quickly.
: Add cookers through upgrade and shorten cooking time.
: Collect various chefs with interesting skills.

◎ Cooking Game ‘Cook Panic’ - Features
: 100 Stages
: 16 cute chefs with 16 different skills
: 10 tasty dishes, 4 drinks
: Various tricks to disturb cooking
: 24 upgrades to help players

◇◆◇◆o*ﾟﾟ*o*ﾟﾟ*o◇◆o*ﾟﾟ*o*ﾟﾟ*o◇◆◇◆
